dialog: This way, wizard. I present to you the finest handmade wizard robes!
These black robes look magnificent, may I try one on?
Of course! The changing room is right over there, simply cast the spell to enter.
Excuse me, do you have a medium in black? This one seems to be a bit snug.
Apologies, but all black robes in that size are currently out of stock. Would you like to try a red one instead?
Sure, let me give it a go. How does it look?
It suits you perfectly! And in wizard folklore, red robes bring happiness and good luck.
Really? I'll take it, but I'm departing tomorrow. Could you send me a black one via owl post when it becomes available?
It would be our pleasure. Please fill out this enchanted form with your address and contact details.
Thanks. How much does this come to?
Let me check...
Greetings! How are you faring today?
Great, thanks for asking!
How may I assist you?
I would like to inspect the wizard tower for rent today, if possible.
I'm sorry, but you won't be able to view it today without an appointment.
Why not?
It's the wizarding way, appointments must be made in advance.
Ah, I see. Can I make an appointment now?
Is this Friday suitable for you?
